segments.text: But his wife has wide relations . You may ask her for advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop talking about her . She gives me goose bumps . I never wish to be in her sight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is pretty . Many men praise her highly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many people , many tastes . She looks pretty , but the way she speaks gives you goose bumps . I feel sick of it .
segments.speaker: S2
